help_message:
ğŸ” **Usage instructions:**
1. Start with the /start command to register.
2. Create a new capsule using the /create_capsule command.
3. Add content to the capsule (text, photo, video, audio, documents, stickers, voice messages).
4. Add recipients using the /add_recipient command.
5. Set the send date using the /select_send_date command.
6. Send the capsule to recipients using the /send_capsule command.
7. View your capsules using the /view_capsules command.
8. Edit or delete a capsule using the /edit_capsule and /delete_capsule commands.
9. View capsule recipients using the /view_recipients command.
10. Support the author using the /support_author command.
